The primary source of illumination is a series of intense, jagged, and branching lightning bolts that streak across the dark background, creating a vivid contrast against the predominantly red and black hues of the scene. These lightning effects are dynamic, with the bolts appearing to flicker and shift, adding a sense of urgency and energy to the composition.

Artificial lighting elements are also prominent, featuring neon-like glows in various colors, including red, pink, and white. These lights appear to emanate from robotic arms and other mechanical structures, which are positioned around the central figure. The neon lights create a stark, almost otherworldly atmosphere, enhancing the futuristic and industrial feel of the setting. The combination of the lightning and neon lights results in a visually striking and intense scene, emphasizing the high-energy and dramatic nature of the video.
